mapper.insert: insert into wechat (openid, unionid, sex, province, city, nickname, headImgUrl, language, subscribe, subscribe_time, idperson) values (#{openid}, #{unionid}, #{sex}, #{province}, #{city}, #{nickname}, #{headImgUrl}, #{language}, #{subscribe}, #{subscribeTime}, #{idperson});
mapper.update: update wechat set openid=#{openid}, sex=#{sex}, city=#{city}, nickname=#{nickname}, headImgUrl = #{headImgUrl}, language = #{language}, subscribe = #{subscribe}, subscribe_time=#{subscribeTime} where idperson=#{idperson}
mapper.select: select * from wechat order by idwechat desc
